akn:section.akn:heading: Judgment creditor to file receipts, in court, of amount collected.

akn:content.akn:p: If the judgment creditor fails to file any of the receipts prescribed by subsection (a) of this section, an interested party may move the court to compel the defaulting judgment creditor to appear in court and make an accounting forthwith. The court may, in its discretion, enter judgment for any damages, including a reasonable attorneyâ€™s fee suffered by, and tax costs in favor of, the party filing the motion to compel the accounting.
